amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 115-217 to prevent reductions of ICBMs below the levels set by the New START Treaty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cheney amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cheney amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Ms. Cheney.
